review: Better than chrome cast! Cheaper too since I pre-ordered.  Watch Netflix, YouTube etc on any TV or projector!  Also you can use all cast to send things from android devices!

review: I love everything Amazon and Fire TV is no exception.  It offers me great movies and tv. I stream my favorite music.  It ties in with my kindle and because of my prime membership I hardly pay extra for anything. I have the Fire TV with voice search and recently purchased the Fire TV Stick for my husband for his tv.  Now he streams classical music while he plays those games he loves so much.  Our grandchildren are loving it too!!

review: This Fire TV Stick works so fast, and reliably, that I replaced my Chrome on one TV. I wish I could cast from my smart phone, but most everything I want to see is available. The HD beats Chrome's SD, too. This is the simplest streaming tool I have used.
